product_name: ColourPopPretty Fresh Hyaluronic Acid Tinted Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Pretty Fresh Hyaluronic Acid Tinted Moisturizer is a hydrating tinted moisturizer with lightweight coverage that evens skin tone and leaves your skin looking fresh and healthy.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, hydrating coveragePerfect for the "no-makeup" makeup lookEvens the look of skintoneDermatologist testedNo added oilNatural skin-like finishKey IngredientsHyaluronic acid, known to hydrate & support healthy-looking skinCoconut water supports hydration & skin softnessItem 2561393How To UseUse Pretty Fresh Blending Sponge for light coverage, Flat Kabuki Face Brush for medium coverage, or fingertips for on-the-go application. Lightly dab and blend into skin.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Water, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Peg/ppg-18/18-dimethicone, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Silica Silylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pyrus Malus (apple) Fruit Extract, Cocos Nucifera (coconut) Fruit Juice, Cocos Nucifera (coconut) Water, Potassium Sorbate, Polysorbate 20, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tribehenin, Sodium Chloride, Propylene Carbonate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol ; May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Use Pretty Fresh Blending Sponge for light coverage, Flat Kabuki Face Brush for medium coverage, or fingertips for on-the-go application. Lightly dab and blend into skin.

reviews.headline: Causes Breakouts
reviews.comments: I'm 69. I thought the hyaluronic acid would be a good start. The plus is the shade Fair was an exact match!  The minus is it feels sticky and like plastic.  Plus it's comedogenic. Returned.

reviews.headline: A holy grail product for everyday makeup!
reviews.comments: I wear this tinted moisturizer on the days i dont want to wear makeup but still want to look presentable and cute. It is lightweight but looks so good and refreshing on the skin! It's definitely buildable too if you want to add concealer, blush, or contour on top!  Honestly I find myself using this instead of foundation pretty often! Its THAT good, and the price cant be beat.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: Not good coverage and felt very sticky.

reviews.headline: Solid drugstore product
reviews.comments: This is a perfectly acceptable day to day use tinted moisturizer. It is lightweight and hydrates my oily skin effectively without being too heavy, when set with powder it holds up through a standard indoor workday and a workout after. If it does wear off in spots it still looks natural. It plays well with other products, drugstore and high end alike, while having better coverage than i expected. I would classify it as light coverage with slight buildability

reviews.headline: This is the best tinted moisturizer EVER
reviews.comments: This has been a life saver for my dry skin. With foundation/skin tint I have a hard time finding a product that doesn't leave my skin looking cracked and dry. This is a very good coverage/moisturizing skin tint. It didn't smudge, it kept my skin glowy without being too oily, and it lasted all day long!

reviews.headline: I feel pretty
reviews.comments: I was searching for a tinted moisturizer and tried all the high end ones before falling up this one.  I have combination skin and most tinted moisturizers were either too dewy or just too heavy.  My skin tone is medium neutral and the #5N works the best.  A little goes a long way.  Yes, it does not cover as well as others but I solved that problem by first applying Dr. Jart+ Cicapair Derma Green Solution.  I have rosacea and this product is amazing. It neutralizes the red making it a perfect base for ColourPop's tinted moisturizer.  I have always suffered from acne and I have textured skin.  But since using this tinted moisturizer and Dr. Jart, I actually have been told I have beautiful skin.  To set it for special events I finish it off with some press powder.  It lasts all day.  I hope they never stop making this product.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product!
reviews.comments: Light coverage with UV protection, gives you a natural look.

reviews.headline: reformulated?
reviews.comments: ive worn this for a year or two and LOVED it but the last two i've purchased now create a white cast when i sweat or if my eyes tear up.

reviews.headline: Got an expired product
reviews.comments: Super orange and oxidized currently waiting for a new one from Colourpop.

reviews.headline: My favorite skin tint!
reviews.comments: Went on easily with my fingers, makes my skin look & feel more hydrated and healthy, lasts all day! Even my husband complimented my complexion! For reference, I have normal skin, but I'm almost 40 now & noticed how dry my skin was starting to feel when using my old skin tint (Fenty).

reviews.headline: Had to Return It
reviews.comments: I've had decent luck with other colourpop products, so I gave this a try when I was low on tinted moisturizer. I often use only tinted moisturizer and mascara on warm days, but this gave no coverage. It also made my face so sticky.

reviews.headline: No makeup makeup look
reviews.comments: Decent product, blends well, isn't heavy or sticky. Doesn't do much for coverage but is good for days when a little coverage will do.

reviews.headline: Your skin but better!!
reviews.comments: If youve been lookong for a light coverage skin tint like ive been but cant find anything thst melts into the skin, THIS IS IT! Ive been looking so long for a product like this. I would say i have combo skin, not to dry, not too oily. Just has a mind of its own. This stuff looks soooo good on my skin throught the dat, highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've had oily skin all my life! I really like this tinted moisturizer as it helps to control the oily skin

reviews.headline: My Favorite Tinted Moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my daily go-to for light to medium, natural coverage. It truly feels like a moisturizer on my skin. It feels lightweight, hydrating, and super comfortable to wear all day. The coverage is just enough to even things out without feeling heavy, and the dewy finish gives my skin a healthy glow. The only thing missing is SPF, which would make it absolutely perfect.

reviews.headline: All I've worn for years!
reviews.comments: I will never not share how much I love this tinted moisturizer. It is the perfect amount of coverage when you just want to look more even and polished. I will wear this forever.

reviews.headline: Great product and price; hate the packaging
reviews.comments: This is a great product that leaves skin hydated and has a nice finish. It is a great value too. However, the packaging (the pump top with the tube) makes it hard to use up all of the product once it gets low.

reviews.headline: Great alternative to foundation
reviews.comments: Fabulous product. I wanted a product that didn't feel as heavy as foundation, but still provided a light coverage. This is it! Light, moisturizing feel, with a smooth coverage. Pairing with concealer on top works, too.

reviews.headline: Hydrated
reviews.comments: Very hydrated  moisturizer! Light coverage. Has no spf. Did settle  in my  pores.

reviews.headline: Best drugstore tinted moisturizer
reviews.comments: I love this tinted moisturizer, it's so good. it's not heavy, it's not too thick. it covers enough of my discoloration without feeling heavy or uncomfortable. it looks so natural and beautiful on my skin. it covers my rosacea really well

media.headline: This product is AMAZING for dry skin!

faceoff_positive.comments:
If this product ever stops being sold I'm just going to give up makeup entirely. Maybe an exaggeration... but maybe not. This tinted moisturizer is AMAZING. I am 33 nearing 34 and have always had very very oily skin and difficult to match undertones (light olive, slightly neutral leaning yellow). Finding face products - liquids, powders, creams, serums, anything - has always been a chore. If a product matches my undertone it doesn't keep my oiliness at bay more than a few hours; if it keeps my oil at bay a little longer then it doesn't match my undertone. And the oiliness? Oh the oiliness. I'd use pH neutral face wash, serum, gel-based hydrating moisturizer, mattifying primer, and long-lasting mattifying foundation (or similar product), finishing off with a mattifying setting spray while chugging water all day to stay hydrated and I'd STILL be blotting by hours 4-6. 

Then I stumbled across this product in Ulta looking for something else entirely but decided to give this a shot because A.) moisturizer; B.) shade range; C.) pretty packaging! I didn't want heavy or full-coverage foundation - I just wanted something to even out my skin tone and I'd take care of the blemishes via concealer. 

I found a shade that somewhat closely matched my skin tone in the always-bad lighting of those aisles, and have been wearing it almost daily for 2 weeks now. THIS PRODUCT IS INCREDIBLE. Truly, tear-inducingly incredible. I feel like my frustrations of spending years and years finding a product that ticks even 90% of my makeup needs boxes has finally been alleviated. I apply it with a damp beauty blender over a washed and well moisturized based - with or without any mattifying primers - and it keeps my skin tone even and my oiliness TRULY at bay for 10+ hours. A brush leaves a weird finish and finger application grosses me out. The oily is still there of course because, you know, our bodies work that way, but the oil-slick ice rink SHINE is nowhere to be seen and I don't feel any of it sitting on my face like I do other products. This feels and looks absolutely weightless, genuinely like a second skin. It also doesn't settle into my laugh lines at all. The color match isn't 10000% perfect because I sort of guessed in the dim aisle but honestly it's like a half-fraction of a shade off and you really cannot tell unless you're in some high powered vanity lighting (I can't even tell in natural light). This is my new go-to that I'll be stocking up on and I hope ColourPop never discontinues this. It would be heartbreaking to have to start all over again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Holy cow this product is amazing

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was so happy to have found a tinted moisturizer and concealer that matched my skin tone perfectly. I also really liked the packaging for the entire Pretty Fresh line, which is what initially drew me to it. However, after using it for about 2 months, I was breaking out so much on the sides of my face, jaw line, neck, and chin. I wasn't developing white heads, but hormonal and cystic acne. It was extremely painful and was making me lose confidence in myself. I didn't know it was this product that was breaking me out until I went on vacation for a week and didn't wear makeup. The acne was subsiding and I was regaining confidence again. But, the minute I came back and put it on my face, the acne came back almost immediately. My hormones were going crazy. I'm not sure what it is, but I do NOT recommend this product at all. 

My friend purchased it the same time that I did and she started realizing it with herself too because her family was telling her that she was getting more acne that usual. Also, we are skin care enthusiasts so we have our routines set in stone from oil cleansing, foam cleanse, toner, essence, serum, moisturizer, eye creams...you name it, we are doing it. This product just destroyed my hormones for the 2 months it was used and I would never wish that on anyone else. We are both 26 F with combination skin.

PSA: If something works for you, don't go looking for something new!! I am still recovering from the scars left on my neck and face.
faceoff_negative.headline: I do not recommend...
